element_text:
{"chunk": "consideration of £458,624 and stamp duty of £2,295 was paid. On 28 June 2021, a further 526 " A" shares were purchased by
the company and cancelled. These shares were also acquired for a consideration of £458,624 and stamp duty of £2,295 was
paid. The shareholders had approved a resolution to purchase these shares. These shares were acquired in order to buy back
the shares of a minority shareholder in the company.", "context": "The chunk describes the company's share buyback activities, where they purchased and cancelled 526 "A" shares on two occasions in 2021 to buy back the shares of a minority shareholder."}
